api balamu meke aththa naththa.boho wita athawarayata path wena kanthawan athara bahira panthi yana samanaya pela shishyawanda,agalum karmanthaye yedena kanthawanda,rakiya sadaha yana kanthawanda we.mita mulika hethuwa keti saya ha thada adumya.(agalum rakiya karana kanthawan adinne kota sayaki ) mulinma athawarayata pathwanne bas riya thula wima wisheshathwayaki.hagim palanaya kala nohaki pirimin kanthawan lagata gos thama lingikandriya sparsha kirimata patan gani.athillima,mirikimath nathuwa nowe.(boho wita sidu wanne senaga pirinu bas ratha walaya )meya ekthara manasika rogayaki.aashwadayak labiya nohakiwita karanne thama as deken rasawida,niwasata gos eya mathak kara swayan windanaye yedethi,nathnam sihinen dushanaya kota hamaraya.(mema thathwaya owunge ayithiwasikamak lesa salakiya haka ) mema thathwayata wiruddawa kanthawak prathichara dakwuyenam,balahathkarayen thama aashawa mudunpamunuwa ganimata tharam pelabe.me bawa danna nisado bohomayak kanthawan asarana we.(samahara kanthawan meyata ida di aashwadayak laba ganna bawa rahasak nowe ) epamanak nowe gambada gris yakada amuthu lingika aashawak athi ekeki.
